===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぶっせつ}}

# the [[saying]]s or [[teaching]]s of [[Buddha]]

====Usage notes====
* Regularly found at the beginning of sutras.
* Originally referred to the sayings of [[Shakyamuni]], but this changed with the arrival of [[Mahayana]] Buddhism and its multiple Buddhas.
